children.name: Value
children.value: Thank for joining us Mr. Jayoma.

children.name: Value
children.value: While we understand that you are only doing your job.

children.name: Value
children.value: At the end there is no place to sex offenders between us.

children.name: Value
children.value: Mr Jayoma please do everything you can to save my reputation sir.

children.name: Value
children.value: Mr. Jayoma uhhh thanks for having me here.

children.name: Value
children.value: Look man I'm going to be honest this case is causing me a lot of issues and I'm about to lose my job because of it.

children.name: Value
children.value: I've been falsely accused of sexual harrasement and the lady made it a public case.

children.name: Value
children.value: Mr Jayoma please do everything you can to save my reputation sir.

children.name: Value
children.value: Thanks for clarifying Mr. Jayoma. I'm sure the court will do me justice.
